---

Perfect! I've updated the Vite configuration to use port 3000 instead of the default 5173. The change adds a `server` configuration block with the `port` option set to 3000.

Now when you run `npm run dev`, your development server will start on port 3000 instead of 5173. You can access your app at `http://localhost:3000`.

If you'd prefer a different port, just let me know and I can change it to whatever number you'd like!
